One more control on e5 before Nf6. Nf6 is better, and main line according to GK database. I'm not a sicilian player, if you are familiar with this opening, please add comment.

White played the opening precisely and as a better developement, more space and a strong center. Black already have an open column to attack the king, + some tempo as Bc4 and Nc3 will have to move in case of b7-b5-b4.
I prefer white anyway.
Plan for white : pawn storm on the king and attack !!!
Plan for black : pawn storm on the king and attack !!!
